attributes.action: 26th March each year to be made NHS day for all NHS staff in thanks for service
attributes.additional_details: The NHS staff right now are working extremely hard and spending time away from there families, while also putting there own lives at risk. I believe we should have the 26th March each year to show support and thanks to them for there efforts. We have other days like armed forces day and I think this is a great day to remember those NHS workers that have given so much.
attributes.background: I would like the government to recognise the work and effort that our NHS staff are going through right now. I believe we should have this day the 26th March each year to be known as NHS day.This day can be where the UK people can show there thanks to those NHS workers that have worked so hard.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
